definition: to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to swim/variant of 遊|游[you2]
to walk/to tour/to roam/to travel
surname You
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
variant of 玩[wan2]/Taiwan pr. [wan4]

sentences.english: Friendship and play shorten the day.
sentences.chinese: 好朋友，共游玩，日子过得欢。

sentences.english: A lot of people make sure that they visit it when they come here.
sentences.chinese: 很多来这里游玩的人都一定会去哥伦布环岛。

sentences.english: The happy scene of children playing in the garden reminded him of his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在花园中游玩的欢乐情景使他想起了他的童年。

sentences.english: With the coming of national day, I have a one week holiday.
sentences.chinese: 星期天，爸爸妈妈和我去牡丹园游玩。

sentences.english: Today I go to the Min Sha Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 今天我去游玩了鸣沙山。

sentences.english: I traveled NYC a couple of times with my friends while I was off.
sentences.chinese: 在闲暇之余，我和朋友们一起去纽约游玩过几次。

sentences.english: My sister likes to go sight-seeing in a pleasure boat around the West Lake.
sentences.chinese: 妹妹喜欢坐游舫绕着西湖观光游玩。

sentences.english: Which cities do you plan to visit?
sentences.chinese: 你计划到哪个城市去游玩呢？

sentences.english: MaxSHracing Team and Li Fuyu accept the Interview of CCTV while travelling, see pictures below.
sentences.chinese: 全动队和李富玉边游玩边接受CCTV采访。

sentences.english: Last month, I went to Guilin and Yangshuo by train for my holiday.
sentences.chinese: 上个月放假自己坐火车去了一趟桂林和阳朔游玩。

sentences.english: The arctic village is you find north, explore photography fans to play, the best place to go.
sentences.chinese: 北极村是你找北，探索游玩，摄影爱好者的最佳去处。

sentences.english: Thank you for spending the whole day with me on Gulang Island.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你花了一天时间陪我游玩鼓浪屿。

sentences.english: The mother wheeled the baby round the park.
sentences.chinese: 母亲用小车推着婴儿在公园游玩。

sentences.english: All work simply no play makes Jair conditioningk a dull young man.
sentences.chinese: 只会用功不游玩，圆活孩子也变傻。

sentences.english: They have decided to go on a visit to the seaside in Beidaihethis summer.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定这个夏天去北戴河海边游玩。

sentences.english: It was fourth-grade division, I went to play a little fellow home.
sentences.chinese: 那是小学四年级的时分，我去一个小同伴家游玩。

definition: to go sightseeing/to tour/to visit/CL:次[ci4]
to go on a tour/to have an outing
to go on holidays/to spend one's vacation
to drive away cares/to relieve boredom
to go on a scenic tour
to play (as children do)/to amuse oneself
to go sightseeing/to spend one's leisure time wandering around
lit. tread the green; go for a walk in the spring (when the grass has turned green)/spring hike season around Qingming festival 清明, 4th-6th April
to enjoy the sights (of)
to go for an outing/to go on an excursion
traveler/tourist/(online gaming) guest player
scenic spot/place of interest (tourism)
to look at sth with pleasure/to watch (sth marvelous)/ornamental
to tour/sightseeing/tourism
to go with sb/to form companionships
to play around/to disport oneself
